name: AGROH
description:
This is a mini-setting that contains a main adventure to end a campaign. In this game, we can play as cavemen or as time travelers in a primitive island controlled by a mutant being and by the idea of a new god: Agroh 

This supplement has environmental themes, discussing destructive agriculture in a time it didn’t really exist. The game also sets civilized people and two ancestral people in counterpoint, in order to see what paths society has taken and what can be done to save it.

This was a very serious introduction, but understand, we left the insane parts for the actual reading. This is pure madness, and not by chance, this is Agroh!

In this 20 page zine you will find:

  • Explore Modrii’s Island and its conflicts
  •  Experience two extraordinary primitive cultures 
  •  Explore dungeons and learn more about the island 
  •  Fight Worms, Agriculture’s cultists and primal spirits 
  •  Feel the organic interactions among the island elements
  •  Send the time travelers back home

Agroh is my contribution to the Primal Jam 2022
